original_text: So the second brother married her. He also died without children. Then the third brother married this woman.
korean_text: 둘째도 그 여자를 취하였다가 상속자가 없이 죽고 셋째도 그렇게 하여

sentences.original_text: So the second brother married her.
Then the third brother married this woman.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러자 셋째 형제가 이 여자와 결혼했습니다.
